metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4352 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the demuxer function in libmpdemux/demux_gif.c inMplayer allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) vialarge dimensions in a gif file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4352` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.1+dfsg1-0ubuntu3.1
mplayer - 2:1.1+dfsg1-0ubuntu3.1
mplayer-gui - 2:1.1+dfsg1-0ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mplayer package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.1+dfsg1-0ubuntu3.1').
